questDescription: A distraught sailor approaches you, their eyes wild with fear. 'Please, you must help me!' they cry. 'My crewmate went missing near the Haunted Mill and I fear the worst.' The sailor's trembling hands grasp yours, pleading for your assistance in unraveling this grim mystery.

objectives.description: Make your way to the ominous Haunted Mill, where the missing sailor was last seen.
Scour the Haunted Mill for any sign of the missing sailor or clues to their disappearance.
Descend into the Haunted Mill's dark basement, where a sinister force responsible for the sailor's disappearance lurks.
Bring the crewmate's journal back to the distraught sailor, offering them closure and the chance to properly mourn their lost friend.
